item.title: https绕过证书认证请求 Get或Post请求（证书过期，忽略证书）
item.description: 报错信息 解决： postman方式 java请求 报错信息 javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: sun.security.validator.ValidatorException: PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: sun.security.validator.ValidatorException: PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target 如果证书过期，配置容器为
